description: Miss Nikki is new to MIP, but not new to daniel. She has a grudge to settle, actually. She owes him an ass fucking and takes it to the set to deliver a stinging payback. Daniel squirms and begs for her mercy but she really has none, and she delivers a brutal strap on scene that daniel will not soon forget. Of course, she gets hers as well. After beating him senseless she fucks and sucks him silly till he drains his come all over the place. Daniel leaves with a lesson earned and Miss Nikki with a very satisfied smile.
title: Danny Wylde and Nikki Nievez
